full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/4/2023 Form OF-230 (Rev. 6-82) Page 2 24. Personal financial resources (a) Cash (c) THA (1 Real estate (value) (b) Bank deposits (d) Other (describe) FROM MY SON 25. Father's name and address (If deceased, so state giving year of death) CHOU YOW-SAN DIED IN MAINLAND CHINA 26. **** Mother's maiden name and address (If deceased, so state giving[year of death) MADAM HAN DIED IN MAINLAND CHINA 27. Name and address of next of kin in home country (If neither parent is living) CHI YU-LIANG (HUSBAND) 11, LANE 93, KU-SAN 3RD RD KAOHSIUNG 28. List all places of residence for 6 months or more since your sixteenth birthday Country Province City or town (f-1) Dates (From-To) Calling or occupation CHINA ANHWEI FENGYANG JAN 1932-SEP 1937 HOUSEWIFE CHINA HUNAN YUNGSUI OCT 1937-MAY 1946 CHINA ANHWEI PANGFU MAY 1946-NOV 1949 R.O.C. KAOHSIUNG TAIWAN NOV 1949-OCT 1986 29. List all organizations you are now or have been a member of or affiliated with since your sixteenth birthday (Include professional, vocational, social and political organizations) Name and address 4-) Dates (From-To) Type of membership and office held, if any NOT APPLICABLE 30. List all languages, including your own, that you can speak, read and write Language # Speak # Read % Write CHINESE GOOD GOOD GOOD 31. Inclusive dates of previous residence in or visits to the United States (Give type of visa or status) (If never, so state) JUN 12 1983-JUL 15 1983 B-2 32. Yes to No Have you ever been treated in a hospital, institution or elsewhere for a mental disorder, drug addiction or alcoholism? (If answer is Yes, explain) 33. Yes No Have you ever been arrested, convicted or confined in a prison, or have you ever been placed in a poorhouse or other charitable institution? (If answer is Yes, explain) 34. * Yes No Have you ever been the beneficiary of a pardon, amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency or similar action? (If answer is Yes, explain) 35. Yes No Have you ever applied for a visa to enter the United States? (If answer is Yes, state where and when, whether you applied for a nonimmigrant or an immigrant visa and whether the visa was issued or refused) KONG 1983 NONIMMIGRANT 36. Yes No Have you been refused admission to the United States during the last 12 months? (If answer is Yes, explain) 37. Yes No Have you ever registered with a draft board under United States Selective Service laws? (If answer is Yes, explain) 38. ? Yes No Have you ever applied for relief from training and service in the United States armed forces or departed from or remained outside the United States to avoid or evade military service? (If answer is Yes, explain) 39. Yes No Do intend to enter the United States from Canada, Mexico or an island adjacent to the United Stat. within two years after arrival in Canada, Mexico or such adjacent island? (If answer is Yes, give the name of the transportation company by which you entered or intend to enter Canada, Mexico or such island)
